results.title: The effect of lowering LDL cholesterol on vascular access patency: post hoc analysis of the Study of Heart and Renal Protection.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Among 2353 SHARP participants who had functioning vascular access at randomization, allocation to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ resulted in a 13% proportional reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Mesenteric_Vascular_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008641 @@@vascular access occlusive@@@ events (355 [29.7%] for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ versus 388 [33.5%] for placebo; risk ratio [RR], 0.87; 95% confidence interval [95% CI], 0.75 to 1.00; P=0.05).

citations.NLM: Herrington W, Emberson J, Staplin N, Blackwell L, Fellström B, Walker R, Levin A, Hooi LS, Massy ZA, Tesar V, Reith C, Haynes R, Baigent C, Landray MJ, SHARP Investigators. The effect of lowering LDL cholesterol on vascular access patency: post hoc analysis of the Study of Heart and Renal Protection. Clin J Am Soc Nephrol. 2014 May;9(5):914-9. PMID: 24626433
citations.BibTeX: @article{24626433, title={The effect of lowering LDL cholesterol on vascular access patency: post hoc analysis of the Study of Heart and Renal Protection.}, author={Herrington W and Emberson J and Staplin N and Blackwell L and Fellström B and Walker R and Levin A and Hooi LS and Massy ZA and Tesar V and Reith C and Haynes R and Baigent C and Landray MJ and SHARP Investigators}, journal={Clin J Am Soc Nephrol}, volume={9}, number={5}, pages={914-9}}

results.title: Simvastatin rescues rats from fatal pulmonary hypertension by inducing apoptosis of neointimal smooth muscle cells.
results.text_hl: The present study was undertaken to investigate the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and its mechanism of reversing established neointimal @<m>DISEASE_Mesenteric_Vascular_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008641 @@@vascular occlusion@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Nishimura T, Vaszar LT, Faul JL, Zhao G, Berry GJ, Shi L, Qiu D, Benson G, Pearl RG, Kao PN. Simvastatin rescues rats from fatal pulmonary hypertension by inducing apoptosis of neointimal smooth muscle cells. Circulation. 2003 Sep 30;108(13):1640-5. PMID: 12963647
citations.BibTeX: @article{12963647, title={Simvastatin rescues rats from fatal pulmonary hypertension by inducing apoptosis of neointimal smooth muscle cells.}, author={Nishimura T and Vaszar LT and Faul JL and Zhao G and Berry GJ and Shi L and Qiu D and Benson G and Pearl RG and Kao PN}, journal={Circulation}, volume={108}, number={13}, pages={1640-5}}

results.title: Simvastatin Restores Down-Regulated GATA-6 Expression in Pulmonary Hypertensive Rats
results.text_hl: Pneumonectomized, @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ had significantly increased mean pulmonary arterial pressure (mPAP), RV/(LV + S) ratio (ratio of the right ventricular to left ventricular and septum weights), @<m>DISEASE_Mesenteric_Vascular_Occlusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008641 @@@vascular occlusion@@@ scores (VOSs), and percent media wall thickness on day 35, all the indices were significantly decreased after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration in these @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu B, Wang XQ, Yu L, Zhou TF, Wang XM, Liu HM. Simvastatin Restores Down-Regulated GATA-6 Expression in Pulmonary Hypertensive Rats Exp Lung Res. 2009 Jun;35(5):411-26. PMID: 19842842
citations.BibTeX: @article{19842842, title={Simvastatin Restores Down-Regulated GATA-6 Expression in Pulmonary Hypertensive Rats}, author={Liu B and Wang XQ and Yu L and Zhou TF and Wang XM and Liu HM}, journal={Exp Lung Res}, volume={35}, number={5}, pages={411-26}}
